channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere Application Server Liberty
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere Application Server Liberty

item.title: CVE-2023-38737|2024-08-02T17:54:38.371Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 22.0.0.13 through 23.0.0.7 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially-crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 262567.

item.title: CVE-2024-27268|2024-08-02T00:27:59.848Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 18.0.0.2 through 24.0.0.4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 284574.

item.title: CVE-2024-27270|2024-08-02T00:27:59.901Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 23.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.3 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in a specially crafted URI. IBM X-Force ID: 284576.

item.title: CVE-2024-27268|2024-07-12T20:55:41.625Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 18.0.0.2 through 24.0.0.4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 284574.

item.title: CVE-2024-22353|2024-07-12T21:17:02.660Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 280400.

item.title: CVE-2023-50312|2024-06-04T17:17:47.429Z -- ibm -- websphere%20application%20server%20liberty
item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.2 could provide weaker than expected security for outbound TLS connections caused by a failure to honor user configuration. IBM X-Force ID: 274711.

item.description: IBM WebSphere Application Server Liberty 17.0.0.3 through 24.0.0.4 is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by sending a specially crafted request. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 280400.
